name: gallinga-multiprovider-generator
description: Función para generar imágenes con múltiples proveedores de IA (Google y OpenAI).

scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy generarImagenGallinga --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --project gallinga-project --region europe-west1 --source . --entry-point generarImagenGallinga --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --service-account gallinga-executor@gallinga-project.iam.gserviceaccount.com
scripts.deploy-gallery: gcloud functions deploy obtenerGaleria --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --project gallinga-project --region europe-west1 --source . --entry-point obtenerGaleria --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.deploy-finalize: gcloud functions deploy finalizarCreacionGallinga --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --project gallinga-project --region europe-west1 --source . --entry-point finalizarCreacionGallinga --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --service-account gallinga-executor@gallinga-project.iam.gserviceaccount.com
scripts.deploy-delete: gcloud functions deploy eliminarCreacionGallinga --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --project gallinga-project --region europe-west1 --source . --entry-point eliminarCreacionGallinga --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --service-account gallinga-executor@gallinga-project.iam.gserviceaccount.com
scripts.deploy-admin-delete: gcloud functions deploy borrarTodoRastroImagen --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --project gallinga-project --region europe-west1 --source . --entry-point borrarTodoRastroImagen --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --service-account gallinga-executor@gallinga-project.iam.gserviceaccount.com

author: PuraKasaka
